name: Decimatio
description:
The battle was a disaster for the Roman army. Your legion had no choice but to retreat, or everyone would have been slaughtered by the Gamebertian army. So that is exactly what your commander did.

However, his superiors did not see it that way. To them he and his troops are cowardly deserters. And they have already taken his head for that decision. Now, what remains to be determined is who among the foot soldiers must also die. One in ten is to be killed. Better hope it is not you.
